title: How to upload my song onto Spotify - Quora

response.answer_text: You cannot directly upload songs to Spotify but you can via a digital distributer. I already answered a similar question. You could read it here: Arjun Asthana's answer to If I wanted to put my own music on streaming services such as: Apple Music, Spotify, or Google Play, how would I go about this? Cheers! Arjun Asthana
Yes, but you have to do it through a third party distributor like CDBaby. Usually that means either paying an upfront cost or giving a significant percentage of your revenue to the distributor.
